post.title: We Really Need Your Help This Weekend
post.description:
Dear Band Families,
We are down to 61 openings for Air Show this weekend. Those 61 spots are worth
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

We are down to 61 openings for Air Show this weekend. Those 61 spots are worth over $2,000! Plus, our numbers for Sunday and Monday are low enough that we may not be invited back next year. Help us earn money for our band this year and keep the opportunity for future years. It is fun and easy work. You get to see the show for free, and lunch & parking are provided too. Make it a family day and volunteer with your high school kids!

Please sign up here.

If you have questions, contact Gary Diehl at gdiehl@broadview-heights.org.
